title: Sorry Tomat0 and Fern
body: My apologies I couldn't connect to that game. Computer just crashed and now won't  come back on :O I thought I should at least let you know what happened in someway.

replies.body: we nearly won, but 4v5's are too hard. even when someone as good as me is playing ashe.
